import Link from 'next/link' export default class extends React.Component { static async getInitialProps({ query }) { let idPodcast = query.id let reqPodcast = await fetch(`https://api.audioboom.com/audio_clips/${idPodcast}.mp3`) let { body: { audio_clip: clip }} = await reqPodcast.json() return { clip } } render() { let { clip } = this.props return <>
Podcast
{/*
{ clip.title }
*/}
< Volver

{ clip.title }

{ clip.channel.title }
} }
